sentences.en: Gautam Buddha himself, is said to have been an ace at archery , chariot - racing, equitation and hammer - throwing.
sentences.cn: 乔达摩佛自己，据说在射箭、战车比赛、骑术和掷链球等方面都非常一流。

sentences.en: Gautam Buddha himself, is said to have been an ace at archery, chariot - racing, equitation and hammer - throwing.
sentences.cn: 乔达摩佛自己, 据说在射箭 、 战车比赛 、 骑术和掷链球等方面都非常一流.

sentences.en: The Orient equitation club is mainly for its members who like riding.
sentences.cn: 骑术俱乐部以会员为主,聚集了各界的爱马人士,并对游园客人等开放.

sentences.en: We can admire the grassland scenery, equitation and watch the sunset.
sentences.cn: 我们可以一起欣赏草原风光，骑马，看日落。

trans.tran_en: the study and practice of riding and horsemanship
